Here's an improved product info description that incorporates the tone and additional information you provided:

At first glance, this may look like your average tee, but it's far from ordinary. Our revolutionary t-shirt brand was created in honor of our late father's vision, a man who loved his country and cared deeply about the environment. Made from a blend of 60% organic cotton and 40% recycled poly rPET, this shirt is not only durable and heavyweight, but it also helps to reduce waste and protect our planet. Each shirt saves at least 4 plastic bottles from ending up in a landfill, making it a unique and sustainable way to express yourself. With a unisex fit and comfortable crew neck, this shirt is perfect for any occasion. Plus, with side seams and a fabric weight of 5.6 oz/yd² (189.87 g/m²), you can rest assured that it's built to last. Join us in honoring our father's legacy and protecting our planet with this one-of-a-kind t-shirt. Blank product sourced from Nicaragua.
